articles.author: Sascha Pare
articles.title: Fearsome saber-toothed giant dominated at dawn of 'Great Dying', but its reign was short-lived - Livescience.com
articles.description: Inostrancevia, a creature with tough skin like a rhino's, migrated 7,000 miles across the ancient supercontinent Pangaea and briefly dominated what is now South Africa before going extinct.
articles.content:
The giant gorgonopsian Inostrancevia looked somewhat reptilian, with large saber teeth and tough skin like an elephant's. (Image credit: Matt Celeskey)
